title: Rescue the Illithid's Captive
content:
Illithid's Captive Objectives

Find a way to release the captive.

We encountered a survivor, trapped inside one of the pods aboard the nautiloid. Perhaps we can find a way to free her.

Talk to the half-elf.

Once you have the Eldritch Rune return to the pod in which Shadowheart is trapped and insert the rune into the console located on its right side. If you successfully pass the dice roll check then Shadowheart will get out of the capsule and you will be able to talk to her.

Rescue the Illit
